name: Project V6
overview: Project V6 is a simulation game that is being a manager of an idol group during a whole year. Durin that time each week the player decide what the members of the group will do, and also have to balance between popularity and the health of the group members since if they work too much they can get fatigue or lose confidence. The player can let the members rest, take walks, practice dancing or singing, train other things, etc. And the game also features some events in which they will face enemies and that use a rpg gameplay style, and there are other mini games. GROUP CHARACTERS: - Masayuki Sakamoto - Hiroshi Nagano - Yoshihiko Inohara - Go Morita - Ken Miyake - Junichi Okada
